German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈʔʊnzəʁə]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Pronoun[edit]

unsere

  1. inflection of unser:
    1. nominative/accusative feminine singular
    2. nominative/accusative plural
    Das sind unsere Bücher. ― Those are our books.
    Diese Bücher sind unsere. ― These books are ours.
